newsitem.title: UK: CLF Hypo sets 250 million mark nine-year FRN.
newsitem.headline: CLF Hypo sets 250 million mark nine-year FRN.

text.p: The following bond was announced by lead manager Deutsche Bank Frankfurt.
AMT 250 MLN DEM SPREAD FLAT MATURITY 28.NOV.05
TYPE FRN BASE 3M LIBOR PAY DATE 28.NOV.96
LISTING BERLIN DENOMS (K) ONE GOV LAW GERMAN
